sentence: But some, including Harriet Hageman, who is mounting a primary challenge against Representative Liz Cheney of Wyoming, one of Mr. Trump's harshest Republican critics, and Kelly Tshibaka, who is running in the primary against Senator Lisa Murkowski, Republican of Alaska, have been asked to hold the date, according to a person familiar with the planning who was not authorized to discuss it.
title: As Midterms and 2024 Loom, Trump Political Operation Revs Up

sentence: (Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY) claims she is playing that role.)
author: Joel B. Pollak
title: January 6 Committee Subpoenas Phone Records of Eric Trump, Kimberly Guilfoyle; Trump Lawyers, Too

sentence: They want an actual representative, and Liz Cheney spends 100 percent of the time talking about Jan. 6.? The select committee denies its work is intended to harm Trump politically, with a panel spokesperson saying it is undertaking a nonpartisan, apolitical investigation aimed at uncovering facts and getting answers about a violent attack on American democracy.? Cheney's campaign is also highlighting legislation she introduced in 2021, including bills to curb the federal government's ability to place a moratorium on oil and gas leasing and repay states for any lost revenue resulting from such freezes.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Jan. 6 probe roils Cheney race in Wyoming

sentence: An ally to Republican Rep. Liz Cheney said that her primary fight against a challenger backed by former President Donald Trump will be the "bloodiest" race in Wyoming history.
author: Carlos Garcia
title: Liz Cheney ally says primary challenge by Trump-backed candidate will be the 'bloodiest' race in Wyoming history

sentence: A potential criminal prosecution, however, could represent a significant return for the two GOP members of the panel, Reps. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois, who have put their political careers on the line to oppose Trump.
author: Stephen Collinson
title: January 6 committee's aggressive approach on Trump may put Merrick Garland in a tight spot

sentence: The House select committeewhich includes two Republicans, Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinoisaims to determine how the events of January 6, and Trump's effort to overturn the 2020 election, were coordinated, as well as how the attack unfolded.
author: Jason Lemon
title: Trump Heads to Texas Rally as Allies Face Subpoenas, Pence Clash Ramps Up
